duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute purchase orders and strategic sourcing initiatives to optimize inventory and support day-to-day production requirements.
Manage RFQ and RFP processes, review bid proposals, and make recommendations based on quoting analysis.
Maintain records, review and execute engineering notifications, and interact with cross-functional teams and suppliers.
Identify and resolve problems, gather and analyze information, and propose alternative solutions.
Monitor supplier performance, identify cost reduction opportunities, and report agreed upon KPIs and cost reduction results.
Travel 5-10% of the time to conduct supplier assessments and manage assigned action plans utilizing lean manufacturing principles.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Operations, or Engineering (Master's preferred)
